Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;wort and yeast water^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

First, make one measure of ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;. I already taught you how to do this. Next, use the ^orange;Mashing Tun^reset; to mix your malt with water. We need one flask of ^orange;Wort^reset;.
Now we have everything we need to make ^green;beer^reset;, the glory of the Gods.
